rows.business_item_short_description: AI model training and inference tailored for automotive industry applications.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Automotive segment focuses on AI model training and inference, leveraging GPU technology to optimize these processes specifically for automotive and manufacturing sectors. This enables advanced data analytics and scientific computing tailored to industry needs.
rows.evidence_span: The Automotive segment focuses on AI model training and inference, data analytics, scientific computing, and 3D graphics with vertical-specific optimizations tailored for industries including automotive.

rows.business_item_short_description: Data analytics services optimized for automotive industry applications.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Automotive segment provides data analytics capabilities that are enhanced by GPU technology, enabling detailed analysis and insights for automotive and manufacturing industries. These analytics support improved decision-making and operational efficiency.
rows.evidence_span: The Automotive segment focuses on AI model training and inference, data analytics, scientific computing, and 3D graphics with vertical-specific optimizations tailored for industries including automotive.

rows.business_item_short_description: Scientific computing solutions designed for automotive and manufacturing sectors.
rows.business_item_long_description: Scientific computing within the Automotive segment leverages GPU technology to perform complex computations and simulations relevant to automotive and manufacturing industries. This supports innovation and development in these sectors.
rows.evidence_span: The Automotive segment focuses on AI model training and inference, data analytics, scientific computing, and 3D graphics with vertical-specific optimizations tailored for industries including automotive.

rows.business_item_short_description: 3D graphics technology with vertical-specific optimizations for automotive industry.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Automotive segment utilizes 3D graphics technology optimized for automotive applications, enabling realistic simulations and visualizations. This technology is powered by GPU advancements originally designed for virtual worlds.
rows.evidence_span: The Automotive segment focuses on AI model training and inference, data analytics, scientific computing, and 3D graphics with vertical-specific optimizations tailored for industries including automotive.

rows.business_item_short_description: GPU technology applied to automotive and manufacturing sectors.
rows.business_item_long_description: The segment leverages GPU technology initially designed for simulating human imagination and virtual worlds, now applied to automotive and manufacturing sectors to enhance computing and graphics capabilities.
rows.evidence_span: It leverages GPU technology initially designed for simulating human imagination and virtual worlds, now applied to automotive and manufacturing sectors.

rows.business_item_short_description: A key platform for large language models in AI applications.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Hopper computing platform is designed to accelerate compute-intensive workloads, particularly for large language models used in modern AI applications. It supports scaling to tens of thousands of GPU-accelerated servers.
rows.evidence_span: Key platforms include the Hopper computing platform for large language models

rows.business_item_short_description: An ethernet platform for AI networking.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Spectrum-X ethernet platform provides networking solutions that support AI applications by enabling scalable, high-performance connectivity across GPU-accelerated servers in data centers.
rows.evidence_span: and Spectrum-X ethernet platform for AI networking

rows.business_item_short_description: A programming model enabling parallel processing for compute-intensive applications.
rows.business_item_long_description: The CUDA programming model allows developers to leverage parallel processing capabilities of GPUs, enhancing performance in compute-intensive tasks. It is a key component of NVIDIA's Gaming segment, supporting advanced gaming and AI applications.
rows.evidence_span: It includes the CUDA programming model enabling parallel processing for compute-intensive applications

rows.business_item_short_description: GPUs designed specifically for AI applications.
rows.business_item_long_description: Tensor Core GPUs are specialized graphics processing units designed to accelerate AI workloads. They form a critical part of NVIDIA's Gaming segment, supporting both gaming and modern AI applications.
rows.evidence_span: and Tensor Core GPUs designed for AI

rows.business_item_short_description: Processors designed for corporate use in advanced visualization applications.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Professional Visualization segment includes corporate processors that provide the computing power necessary for advanced visualization tasks. These processors support complex graphics and computing technologies to meet the needs of professional markets.
rows.evidence_span: The Professional Visualization segment delivers unique value through corporate processors, interconnects, software, algorithms, systems, and services.

rows.business_item_short_description: Interconnect technologies facilitating communication between components in visualization systems.
rows.business_item_long_description: Interconnects in the Professional Visualization segment enable efficient data transfer and communication between various hardware components. This supports the high-performance requirements of advanced visualization applications.
rows.evidence_span: The Professional Visualization segment delivers unique value through corporate processors, interconnects, software, algorithms, systems, and services.

rows.business_item_short_description: Software solutions supporting advanced visualization capabilities.
rows.business_item_long_description: The segment offers software that leverages NVIDIA's expertise in graphics and computing technologies to provide advanced visualization capabilities. This software is integral to delivering unique value in professional markets.
rows.evidence_span: The Professional Visualization segment delivers unique value through corporate processors, interconnects, software, algorithms, systems, and services.

rows.business_item_short_description: Algorithms designed to enhance visualization performance and capabilities.
rows.business_item_long_description: Algorithms developed within the Professional Visualization segment optimize graphics and computing processes. These algorithms contribute to the advanced visualization capabilities required by professional users.
rows.evidence_span: The Professional Visualization segment delivers unique value through corporate processors, interconnects, software, algorithms, systems, and services.

rows.business_item_short_description: Complete systems integrating hardware and software for visualization.
rows.business_item_long_description: The segment provides systems that combine processors, interconnects, software, and algorithms to deliver comprehensive visualization solutions. These systems address the needs of markets requiring advanced visualization capabilities.
rows.evidence_span: The Professional Visualization segment delivers unique value through corporate processors, interconnects, software, algorithms, systems, and services.

rows.business_item_short_description: Services supporting the deployment and use of visualization technologies.
rows.business_item_long_description: Services offered in this segment assist customers in implementing and optimizing NVIDIA's visualization technologies. These services enhance the overall value delivered to professional markets.
rows.evidence_span: The Professional Visualization segment delivers unique value through corporate processors, interconnects, software, algorithms, systems, and services.
